pages.title: The Gathered Breath
pages.text: From each Warden a thread of luminescence is drawn, weaving toward the Heart.$(br)In the span of $(gold)ten counts of ten$() it swells to a globe, then gutters as the Pillar takes its place.

pages.title: Sign of the Firmament
pages.text: Over the rite a vast $(violet)sigil$() turns, seen by those within $(gold)two hundred$() paces. It is the sky answering the earth, a covenant made visible.
